thread.title: Channel24.co.za | Former Generations actress will not be returning to the soapie
thread.title_full: Channel24.co.za | Former Generations actress will not be returning to the soapie

title: Channel24.co.za | Former Generations actress will not be returning to the soapie
text:
Former Generations actress will not be returning to the soapie 2015-10-19 15:05 
Johannesburg - Actress Nambitha Mpumlawana who played Mawande Mememla on Generations rubbished reports that she will be returning the SABC1 soapie. 
A fan on Twitter asked the actress if she will be returning to Generations: The Legacy and Nambitha replied, “ Perhaps those who made up this tale could tell us both!” Perhaps those who made up this tale could tell us both! https://t.co/aI6x1CrqFC — NAMBITHA (@NAMBITHA) October 19, 2015 
The rumours of Nambitha’s return on the soapie began circulating earlier this year when the head scriptwriter and co-producer of Generations , Bongi Ndaba mentioned, “Mpumlwana would be coming back to the soap for a few weeks to wrap up her story line”. 
Soon fans of Nambitha such as television and radio personality Kuli Roberts tweeted; “It’s sooo cool that Generations can’t do without Nambitha Mpumlwana! Go girl!” 
The excitement spread and fans expressed their joy at Nambitha’s return . 
For now Nambitha has assured her fans that she is “happily filming season 2 of Ashes To Ashes .” If you were duped by the fabricated story about me in the @SundaySunSA , please know that I am happily filming season 2 of #AshesToAshes .
